projects.name: File Sharing Website - StreamKrate
projects.description: Implemented a full stack website using HTML, CSS, and js for the frontend and nodejs, express js for the backend. Allows user to share file of size upto 5gb for a faster upload and download implemented it with AWS s3 solution. Contributions: Designed and implemented the frontend, developed RESTful APIs, integrated AWS S3 for scalable file storage, and implemented real-time notifications using Socket.io. Outcome: Successfully reduced file upload and download times, improving user experience and satisfaction.

projects.name: Recommendation System
projects.description: Implemented a recommendation system for recommending similar type of restaurants in a given area to judge the competition and plan your business strategy according to it. Contributions: Developed and trained machine learning models, performed data analysis and preprocessing, and wrote a research paper selected for IEEE Asiacon. Outcome: Enhanced business decision-making processes by providing accurate and relevant recommendations.

projects.name: Multiplayer real-time TIC TAC TOE
projects.description: Build a real-time tic-tac-toe board game which allows user to play it with their friends.

full_output.name: SURAJ GUPTA
achievements_and_awards: Developed and trained machine learning models, performed data analysis and preprocessing, and wrote a research paper selected for publish in IEEE Asiacon 2024.
